reference: Eaton J, and Kortum S.(2002). Technology, Geography and Trade, Econometrica, Vol. 70.

Helpman, E, M. Melitz and S. Yeaple (2004). Export versus FDI with heterogeneous firms, American Economic Review, 94, 1, pp. 300-317.
International Trade, Offshoring and Heterogeneous Firms, Baldwin & Okubo 21 Hopenhayn, H (1992b). Exit, Selection, and the Value of Firms, Journal of Economic Dynamics and Control 16:621-653.
Okubo, T, Picard, P.M. and J-F. Thisse (2010). The Spatial Selection of Heterogeneous Firms, Journal of International Economics, 82 (2), pp.230-237.
